I love this game and the concept behind it is simple and nothing too complex and I think if they made it too complex then it wouldn't be well received but that isn't the case.

Pros:

+ Controls are simple for both the killer and the survivor

+ The concept of hearing a heartbeat to let you know that the killer is near

+ The different POVs for the different sides like the killer is in first person and the survivors is in third person

+ The fair price tags on the microtransactions (i.e. for 500 cells it is $5 which to me seems a fair exchange)

+ The ability to have each individual character to have their own set of perks (i.e. Feng Min one of the survivors has three personal perks Technician, Lithe, and Alert. And out of the three the first one to start using would be Technician because it will save your life if you fail a skill check.)

Cons:

- The mixed amount of skill checks on the generator (e.g. I had one game where I was repairing a generator with zero perks equipped and no one helping me repairing and I only got three skill checks the whole time I was doing it then in the same match the next generator and I had someone helping me repair I had 12 skill checks and the killer never damaged it as I started it from scratch)

- The only way to earn iridescent shards from leveling your personal profile and not at the end of each match (or trial as they call it in the game)

- How much all the cosmetic items cost with the iridescent shards

Игра Dead By Daylight по моему мнению является единственной игрой в своём жанре.
Игра затягивает и со временем не надоедает игроку.
Она совершенствуется и развивается, практически каждый сезон выходит новая глава.И каждая новая глава всё больше затягивает игрока.
 По моему мнению игра стоит своих денег и весь доп.контент себя оправдывает.
Это мая любимая игра и я жалаю ей продвижения вперёт.

Из минусов могу отметить только слабую оптимизацию и проблемами с соединением.
 И в некоторых случиях не сробатывает авто.сохранение и прогресс , допустим за день , не сохраняется.

Честно сказать...у меня был другой обзор на эту игру..когда она была ещё хорошей!
когда не было этих тупых скинов! реально есть очень красивые и подходящие к игре скины..но почти все скины детские и просто смешные! вся атмосфера рушится!
перки тоже какой то бред пошёл.. а про обнову предметов для выживших вообще молчу. 
оптимизация как обычно дерьмо. графика нууу очень еле как бывает приятной.. но всё равно на средний 40 фпс. (или на высоких 40 фпс. смотря какая карта.) 
анимации- реально.. игре уже дох*я лет! но могли бы сделать анимации по лучше!
эти анимации мы видим каждую катку! может уже сделать их лучше? или хотя бы баги исправить с анимацией? а то иногда они бывают. 
каждое обновление делает выжившего дерьмом полным.. как будто хотят что бы боялись киллера! но как тут бояться если эти скины бл*ть!! тут надо уже не о деньгах думать. а о игре. графика , оптимизация , баги , анимация , подключение.. проблем много и они почти с самого начала этой игры. где то год  или полтора года я бы сказал покупать эти игру. 
но теперь я не рекомендую к покупке. только если поржать.

it good do not embrace the concept of a soul imprisoned in a body. He represents pride, liberty, and individualism—qualities often defined as Evil by those who worship external deities, who feel there is a war between their minds and emotions. As Anton LaVey explained in his classic work The Satanic Bible, Man—using his brain—invented all the Gods, All Gods areexternalized forms, magnified projections of the true nature of their creators, personifying aspects of the universe or personal temperaments which many of their followers find to be troubling. Worshipping any God is thus worshipping by proxy those who invented that God. Since the Satanist understands that all Gods are fiction, instead of bending a knee in worship to—or seeking friendship or unity with—such mythical entities, he places himself at the center of his own subjective universe as his own highest value. We Satanists are thus our own “Gods,” and as beneficent “deities”Magus Gilmore’s essay “What, The Devil?” from The Satanic Scriptures discusses this in greater detail.

1000000/10 :>

[h1]Sobre o jogo[/h1]

[i]O jogo é muito divertido, agora conta com servidores próprios, não há mais lag por um dos jogadores ser host. O maior problema é a demora do lobby, principalmente de assassino, prepare-se para intensos minutos esperando um jogo(ainda mais dependendo de seu rank). Quanto ao gameplay, o jogo é ótimo, já que você possui vários sobreviventes e assassinos com diferentes vantagens cada um.[/i]

[h1]Empresa[/h1]

[i]Após conhecer a Behavior pude perceber que apesar de alguns erros, como balanceamento de sobreviventes/assassinos eles são preocupados em atualizar constantemente o mesmo. Estão sempre trazendo novos sobreviventes, assassinos, mapas e etc. Você consegue comprar assassinos por moedas dentro de jogo(uma boa parte deles pelo menos) e skins também. [/i]

[h1]Considerações finais[/h1]

[i]O jogo é muito bom, com certeza o recomendo para quem procura diversão com até 4 amigos, o maior problema seria o balanceamento entre assassinos e sobreviventes, já que existem tantos e com diferentes habilidades únicas que fica difícil manter um parâmetro bom de igualdade entre eles.[/i]

[b]7/10[/b]

Man, I don't even know where to start with this game, it's one of my all time favourite games ever since it released, I played it on xbox for around 200 hours and loved it, but it got to a stage where it was unplayable due to poor framerates and optimisation. Switching over to PC and playing at 60 fps cap constant is a whole new experience, I love the PTB access as well but one thing that I will always say to people about the developers of this game. They try their damn hardest to please and respect their community even though it's packed with toxic people, survivors who teabag, pallet loop, comment "ez" at the end of the game or the killer who get triggered when they don't get a single sacrifice, body blocked because they tunnel, all the fancy stuff dbd have to offer etc.

The 4v1 asymmetric survival horror game puts the player as either a survivor or killer where the objective is to either escape and survive or kill the survivors depending on your role. Despite the survival side of the game, there really isn't any horror, I have never been that spooked by this game besides the odd times when mike myers sneaks up on you, I wouldn't shy away from this game if you saw the word horror and thought I don't want to play that, it might scare me. Trust me, it won't.

Graphically, the game looks good with a variety of different maps to change the game however it does feel like overtime the maps get stale and reptitive, I wouldn't mind dlc of just 4/5 new maps instead of the generic 1 new killer, 1 new survivor, 6 perks, addons, offerings and 1 map. I feel some maps are boring and don't really excite me to play.

Gameplay wise the game is fun and enjoyable especially when you first start off since the matchmaking puts you in a balanced lobby (noobs with noobs). As time passes and you start to decrease your level around to 15-10 you start to realise the toxicity and negativity the community so kindly offers to you. It sometimes makes me wanna quit the game just because of how some people take critism for their bad actions. Also, get used to the constant topics, discussions, blogs, youtube videos talking about nerfs and buffs to survivors or killers. Unfortunately, some players will not like the changes in new patches and that's why the devs cannot find cutting edge to balanced and unbalanced.

Playing as survivor is much more enjoyable than the killer, unless being teamed on and dealing with 4 people at once is your style then I guess you can enjoy it too, but personally after playing killer fairly and still getting comments like "toxic camper" even though I despise of camping and hope they punish campers in future patches, playing killer isn't as enjoyable for me personally.

Perks, offerings and items seems to be the deal breaker in games, it can basically make or break the game as some items are ridiculous especially in higher quantities like Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe for med kits and Odd Bulb for flashes, luckily they tweaked Brand New Part for toolboxes so gen rushing isn't as extreme but is still a huge problem in this game

I could talk and critique this game all day tbf.

With well over 300 hours across PC and Xbox I can say this is definitely one of my top 5 favourite games just for the content it has to offer, especially with free killers and survivors on the odd occassion, the licensed and dlc content, the maps and the introduction to the marketplace. The game is enjoyable especially with friends and the progression system is very rewarding and unique to any game I've seen.

Only thing I'd advise is to watch out for the toxicity

9/10
I'm a killer main and althought the survivors bully sometimes, its pretty fun to play ;). Recommended

Played as killer because there was no "Play with friends" mode yet, get told after 4 killing survivors that I am a camper. Start playing over the next few years off and on, get better at killer and get to play with friends on survivor. New words I have learned:

Tunneling: When you strategically go after another survivor who was just on the hook to kill them faster or in my case run across them sitting still and moaning from pain

Camping: When you hook a survivor and go searching for others but end up doing a route that takes you back near the hooked survivor who "surprise" gets unhooked by two other survivors

Slugging: When you knock survivors to the ground and don't pick them up or in my case you have sooo many survivors running around you that you decide to go ahead and know them all down

Looping: When a survivor is so good that they turn the map into their playground and you as the killer are not allowed on the jungle gym, all the other survivors get the generators done and you feel mildly annoyed :P

360ing: When a survivor does a circle to make you miss your attack, very embarrasing honestly :P

Just some of the more lovable terms, honestly you will run into people who are nice about most things in the game, but reality wise the game is hilarious when somone gets so angry that they proceed to either bash you after game or cry about camping, blocking freddy from picking up a survivor, slugging, body blocking doc from carrying a survivor to hook, looping, etc.

Which brings us to what the real monetary amount the game is measured in, not bloodpoints or shards, its

SALT

Love the game, still wish we had dedicated servers though :P

Поздравляю с покупкой Dead by daylight! 
Итак.. Расскажу вкратце, что вас ждёт:
Играете за сурва? Вперёд к генератору! Садимся и чиним. Порчи нет? Починка идёт хорошо? Встречайте тиммейта, который обязательно зафэйлит скиллчек. Чините в одиночку? Маньяк обязательно придёт за вами! Да, да! Именно за вами! 
  Убегаете от маньяка? Оглушили его палеткой? Все равно получите по лицу. Выпрыгнули в окно? Все равно получите по лицу. Хотите подскажу, который час? Время висеть на крюке! 
Вам повезёт, если вас спасут. Открыли ворота? Вас сняли с крюка, потому что рядом не было кемпера? (Привет вам, кемперы). Встречайте НОЕД. 
Обычно идёт в бонусе с гибелью Франклина. А если добавить «кровавый смотритель», то перед вами настоящий г... Профи. 
Конечно, каждому присуща своя манера игры, поэтому осуждать не будем. 
Перейдём к игре за маньяка. Тут все просто. 
Неважно как вы играете: никого не убил - нуб. Убил кого-то (или не дай бог прикончил всех) - назовут кемпером, туннелиром и пожелают сдохнуть в ближайшей канаве. Также мамкины мансеры будут слепить вас фонарем и приседать перед палеткой. 

Итог: играешь за сурва? Умрешь первым. Играешь за маньяка? Умрет твоя нервная система. Всех благ.

P.S. Обзор не претендует на звание "щутка за трыста". Просто мнение нубика об игре ДеБеДе

Bu oyun oyun listemdeki en iyi oyunlar arasında ancak katillerin güçlü olmasından dolayı kamp yapmaları oyuna ilgiyi azaltmakta. Özellikle oyuna yeni başlayan oyuncular bu tarz kamp gördüklerinde ya oyunu bırakıyorlar ya da onlar da bu kamp olayına alışıp oyunu soğutuyorlar. Oyunun bir artısı varsa o da hiç kuşkusuz katille baş edebilmek için opsiyon olarak sunulan perk'lerdir. Perk'ler ne kadar çeşitli olursa olsun kamp olayına bir çözüm bulunması şart. Kamp yapılması durumunda oyuncular  kamp yapan katili şikayet etmeli ve moderatörler bu durumu inceleyerek katile gerekli cezayı vermeliler. Böylece oyun daha kullanışlı hale gelir.

Until looping is fixed where survivors can't run infinitely around objects with no repercussion, this game will never be as good as it could be.  Survivors brazenly body blocking and taking advantage of their reduced hitboxes to increase distance between them and the killer is just exploiting poor game design.  Forcing me to play a particular killer because survivors are taking advantage of poor design limits my gameplay options as a killer while making the game childishly easy for survivors.  You might as well call this game the "Benny Hill Simulator."  I purchased this game when it first came out and I will not be returning.

800+的杀机小萌新（嘤嘤嘤）女生玩的菜是应该的不用太惊奇！

只玩逃生者｡ ◕ ̯͡◕ &...开局拔线、恶意拍板子、秒救X2、送快递的人真的很讨厌呢！！！

屠夫永远在15段以下（屠夫太难玩了）

以下只是个人看法不必和我纠结讨论哦 ^_^;

不能守尸、不玩针对、高配举报、高段不准玩护士长、1212互动变成嘲讽等等...似乎已经成为了杀机玩家们默守成规的‘‘道德绑架′′。

个人认为技术不到守个尸（不是守到死）也是DD玩家的技术弥补了，毕竟不是所有人都那么腻害的。

抱摔破打击、晃动屏幕等，也是人家技术不够脑子来凑嘛 ╮(╯▽╰)╭ 难道规定要站着不动等你打QTE吗？⊙__⊙ˇ
关于紫配件红道具红苹果...  那些都是人家辛苦点出来的，怎么能浪费呢？逃生者也有权力去使用高配的鸭ㄟ( ▔, ▔ )ㄏ 

玩游戏说不上什么人品行不行，只要不是恶意破坏别人游戏体验，针对至死、鞭尸发泄、利用BUG、插拔、开挂、之类的，玩游戏有个人选择的权力嘛。（这么说不过分吧）

信仰屠屠超可爱X3（此处崇拜脸）不出锤小瘸瘸，不不放夹夹哥，无技能无配件等高难度玩法是站在顶端的大佬们太寂寞开发的更多套路，又或者是某大主播为了节目效果，所以不要把自己的标准强加在别人身上，只要没有采取不正当的游戏方式，你就没有理由去责怪辱骂别人。

我是玩人类的，上面说的屠屠都遇到过，刚开始也愤怒过。

后来自己玩了几把屠夫才知道有多可怜 QAQ 呜呜~~ 也不敢带高配的（本来配件就没多少）
可能是匹配机制不够完美吧，匹配的都是老油条…(⊙_⊙;)…（ ○圭~○列~~怎么酱紫？）
很多时候为了抓一个皮皮怪就亮了三台机 ≧﹏≦ 这时候不小守一下尸的话每人只能挂一、两次就五台电机亮灯了，根本没法愉快的玩耍嗷 ˋ△ˊ（简直是被四个人玩）

看到4个娇小迷人的背影离我远去。。我哭了 (T_T) 发誓再也不玩屠夫！想起以前自己也认同的各种约束屠夫的隐形规矩此时小脸红红哒~ 羞涩 (◡¸◡✿)

（说这么多，屠屠们看到我可以放地窖吗？认真脸） O(∩_∩)O~

Залетает 4 сурва резко, кнш пати, ну я думаю лан не буду брать мементо потому что у меня его блэт нету, продолжаем вот они поставили 4 гирлянды и я 1, мы загрузились в катку, и я вижу сурва бегу за ним значит, заводится 1 ген, сурв после 1 гена просто в пезду провалился хер найдёшь, резко находится 2 сурв, все так же бегает бегает бегает, заводится 2 ген, так же провалился в пезду, и вот 3 сурв аналогичный, и тут 4 сурв как вылезет как упадёт после первой палетты, я его значит поднимаю, и из жопы горилы вылазит 1 сурв с фонарём, спасает сурв, 4 сурв убегает я бегу за 1 сурвом, он теряется значит снова нахожу 4 сурва он уже лучше бегать стал от меня 20 секунд пробега, я его положил, и что же происходит, а эти пезды завели ген и 4 педиг полетел как на сх, с адрика, я значит подхожу к воротам, вижу 4 наглые присадавшиеся рожы, я такой подумал ну лан хотите как хотите нужно было убегать, я отключаю провод кабельного интернета, быренько ложу вешаю всех, и все гг, PRETTY GOOD JOB SOO FARE

Really cool and fun game,highly recommend it to everyone that loves skilled horror games. I got it  with the saw bundle and i am really happy . My main killer  is the pig(Amanda Young from the saw movies),and for survivor Nea. The game has multiple killers from very popular horror movies(ex.Freddy Krueger,Michael Myers,Leatherface,) but the majority of the killers are original to the game. There are also survivors from movies (ex. Laurie Strode,Detective Tapp,Quentin Smith) and like the killers the majority of survivors are original creations of the developers of the game.


Short said: A skilled and fun game with rewarding gameplay from both sides (survivors and killer).

真的沉迷了，雖然人鬼越來越不平衡…但仍然影響不了皮系玩家繼續皮。對新手來説，這游戏是很不友善，但可以約幾个朋友一起玩玩摸索會好很多，或者去youtube找找視頻看，外国的人皇是真的強。玩久了這恐怖游戏就變搞笑game了，真的是款不錯的游戏。

Over 700 hours in, and this should STILL be early access.
Brand new patch, still has trouble with registering hit boxes, locks out menus, poor menu layout, overall trash net code, BUT THEY FINALLY FIXED THE QUEUE TIMES (for survivor)
Could spend time on bug fixes, and better multiplayer, but it seems that cosmetics and more characters are more important.
Love the genre, like the base game design, hate the dev team.
